text: ohuma amaraṇīyayi. ohu hæra, vena kisima deviyeku næta. ebævin “(minisunē!) oba sampūrṇayenma pariśuddha manasin yutuva ohuva ārādhanā karanu mænava! (mandayat) næmadum piḷivet siyalla ohuṭama ayatya. (sakala) lōkayanda utpādanaya kara, pōṣaṇaya kara, saṁrakṣaṇaya karana allāhṭama siyalū praśaṁsā ayatya” (yayida pavasanu mænava)
